programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Our 4 Month Old Needs Us to Be Together
programme.desc: Zakirah is tired of the cheating accusations her boyfriend levies on her. Zakirah comes to unlock her phone.

programme.sub-title: I Have Your 6 Kids, Why Are You With Her?/ Mom, You Don’t Respect Us!
programme.desc: Mandy believes she’s become the other woman. She’s at home raising their children while he’s having an affair.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock the Phone: Prove You’re Not Cheating
programme.desc: Ariana and fiancé Richard's future was paused when her friend uncovered a variety of dating apps on his phone.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Are You My Cousin Or My Father
programme.desc: At first, Neshay thought Michael was her cousin, but it turns out that he could possibly be her father.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Six Kids But You're Denying One? Unlock: Stop Breaking Phones to Cover Lies
programme.desc: Billy has doubts that he's the real father of his 3-year-old daughter; he accuses Tori of cheating; Maya says that her fiancée, Tatyana, took back the engagement ring she gave her; now she wants Karamo to unlock Tatyana's phone.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Are We All Sisters?
programme.desc: Tausha, Nikesha and Shenik, who had complicated childhoods, believe they have the same father and want Karamo to solve their DNA conundrum.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Did You Sleep With My Ex? / Unlock: Did He Steal My Wallet?
programme.desc: On Karamo, Erica is in the crosshairs of a fight between her cousin, Gabby, and best friend Charmm. What was supposed to be a fun night of karaoke turned into fisticuffs. Then, Sierra believes that her boyfriend Tim is cheating and stealing from her.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Are You My Sister?/ Update: My Husband Has A Gambling Addiction
programme.desc: Ivory never knew who her father was and sadly never got to meet him before his passing.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The Phone: My Coworkers Say You Cheat / Unlock The Phone: Why Do You Keep Deleting?
programme.desc: Cristal says that her husband listens to baseless rumors about her, and he suspects that she's cheating!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Husband Has a Gambling Addiction
programme.desc: Shawntia has over $13,000 worth of debt because of her husband, Ian’s gambling obsession!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Are You Really My Mom?; Is the Real Issue Our Mother?
programme.desc: Wisdom and her cousin Brendon were the best of friends until they got into a physical altercation; Kristina and her husband, Mike, reconciled their differences after being separated, then she learned that he got another woman pregnant.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: They're Back With More Secrets...Shocking Updates!
programme.desc: Today, Maury follows up with prior guests to see what happened when the cameras stopped rolling! Which women left their cheating men? Which controlling men changed their ways? Plus outrageous paternity updates!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Paternity Shockers! Family Sex Secrets Exposed
programme.desc: These women have babies that need fathers, and Maury's here with the unbelievable DNA results. But after the results are read, will these men step up and take responsibility, or will the search for these women continue?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Did My Man Father My Sister's Baby? PT 1
programme.desc: Brea is here to prove to Greg that he is the father of her child. But Greg denied her and her baby, leaving them in the streetl Then, Aerial's family treated Justin like one of their own. But now he's denying he's the father of her child.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You Slept With An Ex ... DNA Prove I'm The Dad
programme.desc: John denies both of Misty's kids, but Misty and John's mother Rhoda are here to make him step up and take responsibility. Then, Sean was with Casandra during her entire pregnancy, but when the baby was born, Sean bailed out.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm Testing 3 More Men...Is One My Baby's Dad?
programme.desc: 18 year old Jade is back again and this time she's brought 3 more men to test. But will any of these guys be the real father of her child, or will her search continue? Plus one teen mom swears that Matt's sister has brainwashed him into believing that he's not the father of her baby.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Oversexed and Underaged ... Maury Confronts Teens!
programme.desc: Teen girls think they can disrespect their mothers. They think they can live life without consequences. One of them even thinks that getting pregnant at 12 was a good decision.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: My Son Is Half Your Age ... Stop Sleeping With Him!
programme.desc: Families furious over large age gaps in relationships on MAURY. Couples fight for love despite generational differences. Tune in for May/December drama!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Young Teen Girls Addicted to Sex and Violence!
programme.desc: The mothers on today’s MAURY are at their wits end with their wild and abusive teenage daughters. Maury calls in the big guns to give them a reality check. Steve Wilkos makes a guest appearance! Don’t miss the action today!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'll Prove to All 3 of You...I'm Not the Father!
programme.desc: Cartel refuses to believe that a one-night stand with high school friend Brittany resulted in her pregnancy! Then, are Juan and Clinton the dads of their kids? Plus, Kelly needs to know which cousin fathered her baby!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Pregnant at 13…I'll Prove You Are My Baby's Father!
programme.desc: AJ says there's now way he's the father of Labri's son because he heard rumors that Labri was with other men. But Labri's mother Lanee' is here to lay down the law and make sure that AJ does the right thing, but only a paternity test knows for sure.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Teen Mom Tests 3 Men ... Is 1 Her Baby's Dad
programme.desc: Brittney's already tested 2 men who came back negative. Will the 3rd man to be tested turn out to be the baby's father? Then, Shonitria says that Demond needs to step up to the plate and show here the support that she needs to raise her child.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Not Phoning It In
programme.desc: Aisha McNeil says the defendant was like a brother to her and she’s finding it so hard to have to sue him, but, hey, he owes her a lot of money. He promised to pay her back but he hasn’t. Darren Thomas says he and the plaintiff were friends and he helped her out by paying her bills, paying for dinners, drinks, you name it. One day, she gives him an iPhone 6 as a present then turns around and tells the cops he stole it from her, defaming hi character and causing him to lose business. He’s accused of not phoning it in.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Wedding Wrecker
programme.desc: Steven and Luz Spitzer hired photographer Frank Calabro for their wedding, but chaos ensued when a guest’s camera sparked a fight. Frank withheld the photos, citing a contract breach.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Rental Ruckus
programme.desc: Plaintiff Tien sues landlord Jeffrey for $2,450, claiming he broke his promise to refund her after she backed out of renting his house. Jeffrey insists he doesn’t owe more, saying he already refunded most of the money and was left covering costs.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Tussle Over a Tow
programme.desc: Muharrem and Milos sue Peter for $5,000, claiming he wrongfully towed their car without police orders, causing lost wages. Peter countersues for $700, alleging the car had bogus plates and was on the street illegally.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Drunk Driving Disaster
programme.desc: Trudy is suing bar owner Jefferey for damages because she claims a drunk patron plowed into her parked car.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Father / Daughter Car Clash
programme.desc: Destiny is suing her Father for property damage after she claims he damaged the hood of her car.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Is The Man On My Birth Certificate My Father?/ My Daughter Has Been Suspended 100 Times!
programme.desc: Debbie has been on a quest to find her biological father, and she may have solved this paternity puzzle.
